vision: To implement a premium social and support hub for loyalty members, reinforcing the Pet Wash™ brand with a highly polished, seamless, and performant user experience (UX) across all devices (iOS, Android, Web/Desktop).

frontend.tooling: Expo (for ease of deployment/testing) + NativeWind (Tailwind CSS for React Native)
frontend.styling_standard: Minimalist, Dark-Theme Centric (LUX_BLUE, LUX_ACCENT) with high contrast for accessibility. Must use subtle micro-interactions (Moti or equivalent) for 'luxury influx' animations.
frontend.responsiveness: Mandatory. Must adhere to responsive design principles to look perfect on phone, tablet, and laptop (via React Native for Web).

services_required: Feed_Service (Handles post creation, storage, and retrieval of media/text)
Notification_Service (Handles geo-targeted and individual push notifications)
backend.realtime_protocol: WebSockets (e.g., Socket.IO) or Managed Service (e.g., Firebase Realtime/Firestore) for Chat/Feed updates.
backend.database: PostgreSQL (for structured user/loyalty data) + MongoDB/NoSQL (for flexible, media-heavy posts/messages).

security.authentication: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for all microservice communication and client-server validation.

feature_1_support_chat.name: Direct_Support_Chat
feature_1_support_chat.details: Dedicated chat channel to Pet Wash™ Support Team (+972549833355). Must integrate with a professional help desk system (e.g., Zendesk API). Must not use the M2M chat database.

feature_2_inbox.name: 7-Star_Luxury_Inbox
feature_2_inbox.details: Central hub for Member-to-Member (M2M) DMs. Must enforce a strict 'Opt-in/Approval' flow: User A must send a contact request to User B before chat is enabled.
feature_2_inbox.requirement: Read receipts, high-quality media sharing, and smooth scroll/load performance.

feature_3_paw_finder.name: Paw_Finder_Missing_Pet_Assistance

fields_required.description: Cloud storage URL of the high-res pet photo.

feature_3_paw_finder.resolve_logic: Implemented via a luxury, two-step confirmation button (as designed in the previous component code) that toggles the 'post_status' to 'Resolved' and archives the post from the main view.

feature_4_social_linking.name: External_Share_Integration
feature_4_social_linking.details: Paw-Finder posts and Community Events must have one-tap sharing. This utilizes native device share sheets to pre-populate posts for external social platforms.
feature_4_social_linking.requirement: Must generate a beautiful, Pet Wash™ branded shareable image asset for visual platforms (IG/TikTok) that overlays key 'Missing' info.

code_review_notes: The previously provided React Native component for 'PawFinderResolveButton' is approved for styling and logic flow. The programmer must use NativeWind/Moti (or equivalents) to ensure this level of luxury is consistent across ALL UI components.
Ensure the application state management (e.g., Redux Toolkit, Zustand, or Flutter BLoC/Provider) is architecturally sound and scalable.
